body: Hi farzane, your HBzone is not closed, you have a 'Null Brep' in this part here: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1YrTBMOhwpzEhxxROBDo-RnIuZPUDayuuwYYfgScnwlOqsLSp82gs8KJV6wA9Ha7J04NGBW-BDWoRoL9X5b825e/open_brep_.png) You are right about the error message, in fact I have modified some HB HB lines to run the component. The lines are:  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1YOAp3yb7IVhY1*CAgAAAEN45cLJU*lIwGsnK1lAC-jgsLmUQ-krEXlJ6m8sFz8xjLuZhM-0WTDdiy6KlP4dMKY/HBHB.png) I have closed your HBzone and managed the exception and your file works fine. About the exception I have to ask to Mostapha and Chris. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1aGubwbnVlNABcdsabD6Af9jptcNXWwT-nJklU8kLCDrGCBTZWZidVzZypKPWE*v8s2HAidtjEj7Z6HaZYW*s4m/HBHB__.png) Best Antonello
